Sec. 42a-1-102. Scope of article. This article applies to a transaction to the extent that it is governed by another article of this title.

(1959, P.A. 133, S. 1-102; P.A. 05-109, S. 2.)

History: P.A. 05-109 amended section to adopt the 2001 Revision.
